snippet: Environmental groups had threatened to sue if the agency did not allot time for a full-scale public review and comment on the plan for leases in the Talladega National Forest.
abstract: Environmental groups had threatened to sue if the agency did not allot time for a full-scale public review and comment on the plan for leases in the Talladega National Forest.

headline.main: On Our Radar: A Delay in Federal Gas Leases
